TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CacheRequest extends System.Object

summary.span: 指定在获得 时，UI 自动化框架缓存的属性和模式。

span.span: Specifies properties and patterns that the UI Automation framework caches when an is obtained.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 检索属性和模式通过[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]需要跨进程调用，这会降低性能。Retrieving properties and patterns through [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] requires cross-process calls that can slow down performance. 通过缓存属性和模式批处理操作中的值，你可以增强你的应用程序的性能。By caching values of proprieties and patterns in a batch operation, you can enhance the performance of your application. 通过调用类构造函数创建新的缓存请求。Create a new cache request by calling the class constructor. 通过重复调用来填充该请求方法。The request is populated by repeated calls to the method. 只有一个可处于活动状态。Only a single can be active. 有两种方法来激活请求：There are two ways to activate a request: - 调用针对此请求。Call on the request. 这将推送到堆栈上，请求并请求将弹出时释放此对象。This pushes the request onto the stack, and the request is popped when the object is disposed. 若要确保处置，即使引发异常，请使用中的返回值内`using`块 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal even if an exception is raised, use the return value from within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). - 放置在内部堆栈上的请求，通过调用。Put the request onto the internal stack by calling . 仅在堆栈上最顶层的请求处于活动状态，并且它必须是从堆栈中移除的下一个。Only the topmost request on the stack is active, and it must be the next one removed from the stack by . 弹出请求停用它。Popping the request deactivates it. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] 获取请求处于活动状态时的元素将已经缓存的属性和模式指定的值。 elements obtained while the request is active will have cached values for the properties and patterns specified. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)] 下面的示例演示如何使用和来缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use and to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建后，标识符作为默认属性添加到缓存。When a is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.IDisposable Activate() cil managed

summary.span: 将此 设置为在同一线程中请求 时返回的项的活动规范。

span.span: Sets this as the active specification for the items that are returned when an is requested on the same thread.

returns.span: 可用于释放 的对象。

span.span: The object that can be used to dispose the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时通常最好使用和作为一种激活。Using this method is usually preferable to using and as a means of activating the . 对象推送到堆栈上时调用，该方法并释放时，然后弹出。The object is pushed onto the stack when is called, and then popped off when it is disposed. 为了确保释放对象，将返回值中的`using`块 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)。To ensure disposal, place the return value within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来缓存模式和属性。The following example shows how to use to cache patterns and properties. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#107)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#107)]

summary.span: 将一个属性或模式标识符添加到 。

span.span: Adds a property or pattern identifier to a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当创建对象时，标识符作为默认属性添加到缓存。When a object is created, the identifier is added as a default property to cache. 添加已在缓存请求的对象没有任何影响。Adding an object that is already in the cache request has no effect.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定返回的元素是应包含对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用，还是仅包含缓存的信息。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether returned elements should contain full references to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], or only cached information.

value.span: 如果返回的元素包含对基础 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] 的完整引用，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the returned elements have a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是默认值，并指定返回的元素，包含对基础的完全引用[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]。 is the default value, and specifies that returned elements contain a full reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]. 指定返回的元素具有未引用基础[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)]，并只包含缓存的信息。 specifies that the returned elements have no reference to the underlying [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)], and contain only cached information. 对于元素，包括某些操作， ，和，需要完整的参考; 尝试执行这些上都未元素会导致。Certain operations on elements, including , , and , require a full reference; attempting to perform these on an element that has none results in an . 使用可以是时需要仅有属性，效率更高，因为它避免了开销参与设置完整的引用。Using can be more efficient when only properties are needed, as it avoids the overhead involved in setting up full references. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，设置为、 结果只能使用缓存的属性和模式是可用于检索到的对象。In the following example, is set to , with the result that only cached properties and patterns are available for the retrieved object. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pop() cil managed

summary.span: 从当前线程的内部堆栈中移除活动的 。

span.span: Removes the active from the internal stack for the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用删除仅当前处于活动状态的请求方法。Only the currently active request can be removed using the method. 在尝试删除是不引发异常的当前一个结果的请求。Attempting to remove a request that is not the current one results in an exception. 除非要嵌套缓存请求，最好使用将请求放在堆栈上。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，你可以使用内`using`块 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)，确保请求将从堆栈弹出，即使引发异常。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何停用使用。The following example shows how to deactivate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

exception.span: 尝试移除的缓存请求不是最后压入堆栈的堆栈请求。

span.span: An attempt was made to remove a cache request that was not the last one pushed onto the stack.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Push() cil managed

summary.span: 将 压入内部状态堆栈，并使它成为当前线程中的活动请求。

span.span: Places the on the internal state stack, making it the active request on the current thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多个对象可放置到状态堆栈。Multiple objects can be placed onto the state stack. 必须从; 它们已推送的顺序中的堆栈中删除缓存请求否则为引发异常。Cache requests must be removed from the stack in the order they were pushed on; otherwise, an exception is raised. 除非要嵌套缓存请求，最好使用将请求放在堆栈上。Unless you are nesting cache requests, it is preferable to use to place the request on the stack. 原因是，你可以使用内`using`块 (`Using`在 Visual Basic 中)，确保请求将从堆栈弹出，即使引发异常。The reason is that you can use within a `using` block (`Using` in Visual Basic), ensuring that the request is popped off the stack even if an exception is raised. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何激活使用。The following example shows how to activate a by using . [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ TreeFilter { System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Automation::Condition ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，指定在缓存时要使用的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树的视图。

span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree to use when caching.
The view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree.
The default view is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关其他信息的视图[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素树中，请参阅[UI 自动化树概述](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md)。For additional information on views of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element tree, see [UI Automation Tree Overview](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-tree-overview.md). ## Examples 在下面的示例中，设置为，以便所有元素，而不考虑它们是否的内容视图或控件视图的一部分都进行缓存。In the following example, is set to so that caching is done for all elements, regardless of whether they are part of the content view or the control view. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#108)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#108](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#108)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope TreeScope { System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope get(); void set(System::Windows::Automation::TreeScope value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定是仅对子树的根进行缓存，还是也对其子级或子代进行缓存。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether caching is done only for the root of the subtree, or also for its children or descendants.
One or more of , , , or .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 缓存的范围相对于或多个对象正在提取，不是相对于其上的对象或调用。The scope of caching is in relation to the object or objects being fetched, not in relation to the object on which or is called. 请参阅示例。See the example. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，列表框元素获取从父窗口元素时处于活动状态和是。In the following example, a list box element is obtained from the parent window element while a is active and is . 子元素 （即，列表项） 的指定的属性存储在缓存中，并且可以从检索列表框。The specified properties of the child elements (that is, the list items) are stored in the cache and can be retrieved from the of the list box. [!code-csharp[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/CSharp/ClientForm.cs#119)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#119](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAClient_snip/VisualBasic/ClientForm.vb#119)]

exception.span: 尝试将该属性设置为 或 。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to or .
